room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
room_address: 200 S. Meridian St., Suite 220 Indianapolis, IN 46225
room_description: It’s the roaring 20’s and you and your seedy gang of no-goods are on the lookout for your next caper. Rumor has it that the Fletcher Bank & Trust Co. has just received a new shipment of gold! Gold fever has gripped you and you will stop at nothing to get it! It will involve a little safe-cracking, so you will need to act quickly before the cops arrive. Follow the clues and crack the safe to get your haul of 6 beautiful bars of pure gold!
